articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Gill will struggle like anyone…’: Chappell names AUS pacers who'll trouble him - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Chappell said Gill will have trouble coping with the extra bounce and pace if the Australian pacers hit the right areas at The Oval in the WTC final. | Cricket
articles.content: Legendary Australia cricketer Greg Chappell identified a chink in Shubman Gill's armour ahead of the all-important India vs Australia World Test Championship final at The Oval starting on June 7. Gil… [+2405 chars]
